text: Robert Mack (1 July 1959 - 4 July 2020) was an Austrian ice hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1988 Winter Olympics. He was born in Klagenfurt, Austria. Mack died on 4 July 2020 in Vienna, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian ice hockey players Category:Olympians for Austria Category:People from Klagenfurt
title: Robert Mack
